forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain this morning. Breaks of sun this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by some light rain after midnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain in the morning, with showers continuing in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain in the morning, with showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early with thunderstorms developing late. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with thunderstorms by morning. Low 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low near 50F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early followed by occasional showers late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
